snippet.title: Jetstar launches cut-price Coast flights, accommodation deal
snippet.content:
JETSTAR has just launched a massive cut-price Sunshine Coast holiday deal.
If you're booking holidays for family and friends, or expecting visitors from interstate, don't let them lock anything in just yet.
Discount holiday packages for a family of four have been released for those heading to the Sunshine Coast from Sydney, Melbourne or Adelaide.
Three nights accommodation and return airfares are included, with Novotel Twin Waters Resort and Breakfree Alexandra Beach Resort partnering with Jetstar for the deal.
For Sydneysiders looking for an escape, deals start from $376 per person for the two adults, with kids 11-and-under free.
Travel dates vary between the two resorts, starting from mid-October until early December, with additional dates in February, March and May.
Melbournites seeking some fun in the sun can secure the deal from $436 per adult (Novotel) or $517 per adult (Breakfree), while those in Adelaide can secure the vacation from $448 per person (Novotel) or $529 per person (Breakfree).
Prices and details about the deal, including conditions, are on the Jetstar website.
Travellers have a week to get their hands on a deal, with the sale ending on August 10.

IF YOU'RE going to see one rom com this year, make it this one. Charlize Theron is killer but the plot is a filler.
